mapper.select: SELECT RGN_NO , RGN_NO AS CODE , RGN_NM , RGN_NM AS NAME , RGN_DETAIL , RGN_DETAIL AS SUB , RGN_DESC , ATTACH_NO , LATITUDE , LONGITUDE , POP_RGN_YN FROM REGION
SELECT RGN_NO , RGN_NO AS CODE , RGN_NM , RGN_NM AS NAME , RGN_DETAIL , RGN_DETAIL AS SUB , RGN_DESC , ATTACH_NO , LATITUDE , LONGITUDE , POP_RGN_YN FROM REGION WHERE POP_RGN_YN = 'Y'
